mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sf.function_code FROM sys_user su JOIN sys_role_function srf ON su.role_id = srf.role_id JOIN sys_function sf ON srf.function_id = sf.id WHERE su.id = #{userId} AND sf.function_code IS NOT NULL AND sf.function_code != ''

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.created_time, r.role_name AS roleName, u.role_id, u.status FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON u.role_id = r.id
u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
ORDER BY u.id DESC
